featured.text: If we go north or south, we won’t notice any difference, because there is usually no time zone change.
I usually eat lunch from twelve to one and generally take a fifteen-minute break in the morning and in the afternoon.
Initial contact is made via e-mail, with subsequent communication usually by phone.
They usually do not meet the standard of exercise recommended by WHO.
Usually, the kilt covers the body from the waist down to just above the knees.

other.text: The singers usually sing popular folk songs.

If the number 16 is in the same area as the number making the call, an area code usually doesn’t need to be dialed.

Research shows that men and women usually think differently.

Folk tales are usually the stories of _________.
They usually would not leave people’s houses until they were sure their customers were awake.
In a job interview, attitude and personality are usually important _____ that influence the decision of the interviewers.
A human body usually has a ________ temperature of about 37 degrees C. (A) steady (B) various (C) gradual (D) precious 8.
The trunk of redwood trees is very stout and usually forms a single straight column.

Which of the following statements is true about West Nile? (A) Its symptoms usually appear within two weeks.

Kids don’t usually like radishes, but if kids cut them up and put them in the salad, they will love the dish.
They usually live near the coastal area where there is more fresh water.
Usually a stye is accompanied by a swollen eye.
Disks are usually sent to the Disk Doctor by post, but sometimes people are in such a hurry that they cannot wait for the mail to come.

The annual fee is usually less than US$100.
In winter, our skin tends to become dry and _____, a problem which is usually treated by applying lotions or creams.
Because yellow-bellied sea snakes usually spend all of their time far from land, rain is the animals’ only source of fresh water.
28 , professional football teams usually play no more than fourteen games a year.
An ______ person is usually pleasant and easy to get along with, but don’t expect that he or she will always say “yes” to everything.
Performers usually play on a tall stage with lanterns and banners strung all around.
About 1 in 5 persons suffers fever, headaches, and body aches, usually lasting a week or so.
Firstborns, under normal circumstances, are usually the most strongly motivated toward achievement.
Jane usually buys things on ______.

definition.example: I usually go for a walk in the evening.
